name: Space & Asset Lookup
description: Helps facilities managers find information about building spaces, room configurations, equipment locations, and asset details.

friction_addressed.description: Finding information about spaces, equipment locations, and building systems
Locating asset details, specifications, and installation information

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster answers to space and asset inquiries
secondary_benefits: Quicker response to employee space questions
Better asset tracking and inventory visibility
Easier coordination for moves and changes
Reduced time searching for equipment info

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to floor plans, space inventories, asset registers, and equipment documentation
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) floor plans and space layouts, (2) room/space inventories, (3) asset registers and equipment lists, (4) building information documents

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to facilities management or asset tracking systems via Graph connectors
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for CAFM, IWMS, or asset tracking systems

actions.description: This agent retrieves information but does not modify space assignments, asset records, or booking systems.

conversation_starters.title: Room info
conversation_starters.text: What's the capacity of conference room [name]?

conversation_starters.title: Floor plan
conversation_starters.text: Show me the floor plan for [building/floor]

conversation_starters.title: Asset details
conversation_starters.text: What do we know about asset [ID/name]?

conversation_starters.title: Space availability
conversation_starters.text: Which conference rooms have video conferencing?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with floor plans and space documentation
Asset register or equipment list in SharePoint

admin_considerations: Keep floor plans current when layouts change
Update asset register as equipment moves
Consider sensitivity of detailed floor plans
Archive outdated versions to improve search
